The gap is an Agility obstacle found multiple times within the Canifis Rooftop Course. An Agility level of 40 is required to pass the obstacle, which will then grant the player Agility experience.

The '''gap''' is an [[Agility]] obstacle found multiple times within the [[Canifis Rooftop Course]]. An Agility level of 40 is required to pass the obstacle, which will then grant the player Agility experience.
